name: linkcard
description: A simple and fast link aggregation page with i18n support

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:all
scripts.build:all: npm run build:html && npm run build:css && npm run build:js && npm run build:copy
scripts.build:js: mkdir -p docs/js && terser src/js/main.js -c -m -o docs/js/main.js && terser src/js/share.js -c -m -o docs/js/share.js && terser src/config.js -c -m -o docs/config.js
scripts.build:copy: cp -r src/assets docs/assets 2>/dev/null || true && cp src/assets/favicon.ico docs/ 2>/dev/null || true

author: Ray
